line.text: Oh, I was on my way to save a city from a robot uprising.
What about Zap? Or Duck Enterprises?
What? I don't know what you're talking about.
I just sort of appeared here. And now the people of Duckville need me to defend them from the robots!
100%! I'm Ducky Flippers, ultimate ruler of the universe! And a little offended that you don't recognize me.
Yes. Bow to your leader, you--who even are you?
Uh...I'm Zala the Zum. I just took the DuckLine Emergency Express out of Duck Enterprises, and it stopped here for some reason. And I think you should come with me.
I'm busy with the robot uprising thing, sorry.
Yeah, I'm not so sure about the whole robot uprising thing. Duck City's looking pretty abandoned.
Really? Ok, I guess I'll go with you then.
